item.description:
Once again, the Strand Theatre in Clinton is showing their Summer Movie Classics.  The schedule is below.  All shows start at 7:00 PM.  Let's meet outside the theater at 6:00.  This gives us time to find good seats.  If you need to reach me, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

The lines for the Summer Classics tend to be long, and sometimes it's hard to find good seats. Let's try meeting at 6 instead of 7. If you can't be there at 6, let me know and we'll save you a seat.

  • July 9 - Jaws
  • July 16 - The Princess Bride
  • July 23 - Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
  • July 30 - The Goonies
  • August 6 - The Bodyguard (in honor of the late Whitney Houston)
  • August 13 - Rear Window
  • August 20 - Blazing Saddles
  • August 27 - The Graduate
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet outside the theater. I look like my photo.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Movie Classics at The Strand - Rear Window
